name: Drop Cap !
body:
### Welcome to jQuery Drop Caps Plugin

Drop Caps is a jQuery plugin to add magazine like drop cap; a large initial capital lettersâ€”to HTML5 content. Portable, robust and universal. Works on all languages including languages which has UTF-8 text chars.

CSS3 : You can try to set lineHeight, fontSize, margin, and padding but they may be ignored. The CSS (jQuery syntax) you might want to set yourself includes color, opacity, background, and fontFamily. All Web Fonts Supported including TypeKit Fonts.

more coming soon
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
